FuncDef: The display isis statistics packet command displays the statistics of an IS-IS process, including the routes that are learned from other IS-IS routers, routes that are imported from other protocols, the convergence priority of IS-IS routes, and LSPs that are generated locally. The display isis statistics packet command displays the statistics of an IS-IS process, including the routes that are learned from other IS-IS routers, routes that are imported from other protocols, the convergence priority of IS-IS routes, and LSPs that are generated locally.
CLIs: display isis statistics packet lsp [ <process-id> | { vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics of the packets on a specified interface.
-

Specifies an IS-IS process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays statistics of various IS-IS packets.
-

Displays mesh-group information about a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
